T.query: select c.personid from customer c join person p on c.personid = p.businessentityid where p.firstname = 'James' or p.middlename ='C' or p.modifieddate= '2014-05-27 00:00:00';

F.query: select c.personid from customer c join person p on c.personid = p.businessentityid where p.firstname = 'William' or p.lastname ='James' or p.modifieddate= '2014-05-27 00:00:00';
